titleStmt.title: Europæ modernæ speculum, or, A view of the empires, kingdoms, principalities, seignieuries [sic], and common-wealths of Europe in their present state, their government, policy, different interest and mutual aspect one towards another, from the treaty at Munster, anno 1648, to this present year.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Peter Parker, and are to be sold at his shop ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the British Library.
